apps.caption: Media Sample Using PhoneGap
apps.tooltip: Use of PhoneGap media object for recording and playing back audio sound.
apps.description: Media Sample uses PhoneGap media object for recording and playing back audio sound. It detects if a previous recorded media exists.

apps.caption: PhoneGap Camera API Sample
apps.tooltip: Capture a photo using a device camera and edit (zoom and crop) the picture.
apps.description: This sample demonstrates the use of the PhoneGap Camera API to capture photos with device camera or to retrieve photos from the saved photo albums. It also demonstrates the variety of configurations with which photos can be captured. The application uses jQuery as well as jQuery Mobile (for theming).

apps.caption: PhoneGap Contacts API Sample
apps.tooltip: Contacts: Work with the devices contact database.
apps.description: This sample demonstrates the use of the PhoneGap Contacts API for getting access to the device contacts database.

apps.caption: PhoneGap Compass API Sample
apps.tooltip: Simple Compass application uses PhoneGap Compass API.
apps.description: This sample application demonstrates the use of the PhoneGap Compass API.

apps.caption: Bubble Level
apps.tooltip: Simple tool to measure angles on surface which uses PhoneGap Accelerometer API.
apps.description: This sample application demonstrates the use of the PhoneGap Accelerometer API. BubbleLevel allows to measure surface angles. BubbleLevel  changes its skin in dependence of device orientation.

apps.caption: Labyrinth Game
apps.tooltip: Simple game to demonstrate the PhoneGap Accelerometer API.
apps.description: This simple game demonstrates the use of the PhoneGap Accelerometer API. Connect the Intel logo with the mobile phone icon using the device accelerometer. The map on the board is generated dynamically.

apps.caption: Handbell
apps.tooltip: Handbell Using PhoneGap Media
apps.description: HandBell allows you to shake a picture of a bell and hear sounds. It demonstrates the use of PhoneGap media object.

apps.caption: ToDo List
apps.tooltip: ToDo List Sample
apps.description: This application is a simple ToDo list.

apps.caption: Counting Beads Game
apps.tooltip: A simple HTML5 game for kids.
apps.description: A simple game built using HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3, and jQuery that teaches young kids counting up to 50.

apps.caption: Html5 Geolocation Using Canvas
apps.tooltip: Uses geolocation data as a mechanism in which rendering of graphics onto a canvas element takes place based on the indicated relative location.
apps.description: This HTML5 application was built using the Geolocation and Canvas application programming interface (API) of the HTML5 W3C specification.

apps.caption: Flood Puzzle Game
apps.tooltip: Flood Puzzle Game
apps.description: A flood game, similar to Color Flood or Flood-it, where the goal is to fill the field with a single color using the minimum number of color transitions

apps.caption: RPN Calculator
apps.tooltip: Reverse Polish Notation Calculator.
apps.description: A Themable Stack based calculator using reverse polish notation, akin to the HP calculators that were popular with engineers and scientists in the 1980s.  Several different themes are included, with different color schemes, styles and button animations

apps.caption: Where Is My Car
apps.tooltip: Runs as web app or PhoneGap app.
apps.description: Runs as both a web app or as a PhoneGap application. Uses GeoLocation, LocalStorage apis and unifies startup events.

apps.caption: Towers of Hanoi
apps.tooltip: Animate the Towers of Hanoi Puzzle
apps.description: This example shows how to use CSS and jQuery to animate the solving of the Towers of Hanoi puzzle.  The game will dynamically scale itself to fit any screen size

apps.caption: jQM List Nav
apps.tooltip: jQuery Mobile scaffold using list-based navigation.
apps.description: This sample is a multi-page jQuery Mobile scaffold using list-based navigation. It can help familiarize you with using jQuery Mobile pages and basic widgets like toolbars and listviews.

apps.caption: Bubblewrap
apps.tooltip: Fun bubble popping game
apps.description: Bubblewrap is a fun bubble popping game implemented with HTML5/Javascript technology

apps.caption: jQM Tab Nav
apps.tooltip: jQuery Mobile scaffold using tab-based navigation.
apps.description: This sample is a multi-page jQuery Mobile scaffold using tab-based navigation. It also demonstrates how to create a custom options menu widget that maintains state across page transitions, and how to dynamically inject widgets into the DOM.

apps.caption: jQM Springboard Nav
apps.tooltip: jQuery Mobile scaffold using springboard-based navigation.
apps.description: This sample is a multi-page jQuery Mobile scaffold using springboard-based navigation. It also demonstrates custom styling techniques to adapt to various screen sizes and rotations, and achieve a different look and feel than jQuery Mobile defaults.

apps.caption: HTML5 Local Storage
apps.tooltip: HTML5 Local Storage.
apps.description: This sample application demonstrates the use HTML5 local storage. The sample demonstrates how to use the HTML5 Local storage features, how to set the key value pairs and how to retrieve the Key value pairs using local storage

apps.caption: HTML5 Web SQL Storage
apps.tooltip: HTML5 Web SQL Storage.
apps.description: The sample demonstrates how to use the HTML5 Web SQL storage features, how to set the key value pairs and how to retrieve the Key value pairs using Web SQL storage
